name: Forgotten Heroes
description: Forgotten Heroes Online - it's role-playing, turn-based online strategy, with addictive gameplay, good graphics and excellent strategic component. You will fight other players in real time!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10 32x Processor: 1,1 GHz CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 32x/64x Processor: 1,2 GHz CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 400 MB available space
